short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Topaz Chrome Extension for Adobe Sign enables users to sign PDFs on a variety of Topaz signature pads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adobe Sign enables customers to apply signatures to PDF documents by typing their name and applying it, optionally with a signature image. The Topaz Adobe Sign Chrome Extension enhances this signing capability by enabling users to sign naturally with an electronic pen on Topaz signature pads and binding that image and data to the signed document.
